Uses of Interface
com.cyc.kb.Assertion

  • Packages that use Assertion 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.kb
    Interfaces for manipulating CycL-based java objects, both for the purpose of making assertions and for retrieving terms and values via simple queries.
    com.cyc.kb.spi
    All KB API service provider interfaces.
    com.cyc.kb.wrapper
    Abstract classes for implementing KbObjects per the decorator pattern.

    • Uses of Assertion in com.cyc.kb

      Subinterfaces of Assertion in com.cyc.kb 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Fact
      The interface for Assertions that relate KbCollections and KbIndividuals to each other and to primitive values such as numbers and strings.
      interface  Rule
      The interface for CycL rules (i.e.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb that return Assertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Assertion Assertion.addQuotedIsa(KbCollection collection, Context context)
      A quotedIsa assertion relates CycL expression to SubLExpressionType.
      Assertion Sentence.assertIn(Context ctx)
      Assert this sentence in the context ctx.
      Assertion Assertion.changeDirection(Assertion.Direction direction)
      Change the direction of the assertion to the input direction.
      static Assertion Assertion.findOrCreate(Sentence formula) 
      static Assertion Assertion.findOrCreate(Sentence formula, Context ctx) 
      static Assertion Assertion.findOrCreate(Sentence formula, Context ctx, Assertion.Strength strength, Assertion.Direction direction)

      static Assertion Assertion.get(Sentence formula, Context ctx)
      Get the Assertion object that corresponds to formula in the context ctx.
      static Assertion Assertion.get(String hlid)
      Get the Assertion object that corresponds to hlid.
      static Assertion Assertion.get(String formulaStr, String ctxStr)
      Get the Assertion object that corresponds to formulaStr in the context corresponding to ctxStr.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb that return types with arguments of type Assertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Assertion> Assertion.getSupportingAssertions()
      the collection of assertions that directly support this assertion. For assertions that are not deduced, the collection will be empty.

    • Uses of Assertion in com.cyc.kb.spi

      Methods in com.cyc.kb.spi that return Assertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Assertion AssertionService.findOrCreate(Sentence formula)
      Find or creates the Assertion object that corresponds to formula in the default assertion context (@link DefaultContext}.
      Assertion AssertionService.findOrCreate(Sentence formula, Context ctx)
      Finds or creates the Assertion object that corresponds to formula in ctx.
      Assertion AssertionService.findOrCreate(Sentence formula, Context ctx, Assertion.Strength strength, Assertion.Direction direction)
      Finds or creates the Assertion object that corresponds to formula in ctx.
      Assertion AssertionService.findOrCreate(String formulaStr)
      Finds or creates the Assertion object that corresponds to formulaStr in the default assertion context.
      Assertion AssertionService.findOrCreate(String formulaStr, String ctxStr)
      Finds or creates the Assertion object that corresponds to formulaStr in the context corresponding to ctxStr.
      Assertion AssertionService.findOrCreate(String formulaStr, String ctxStr, Assertion.Strength strength, Assertion.Direction direction)
      Finds or creates the Assertion object that corresponds to formulaStr in the context corresponding to ctxStr.
      Assertion AssertionService.get(Sentence formula, Context ctx)
      Get the Assertion object that corresponds to formula in the context ctx.
      Assertion AssertionService.get(String hlid)
      Get the Assertion object that corresponds to hlid.
      Assertion AssertionService.get(String formulaStr, String ctxStr)
      Get the Assertion object that corresponds to formulaStr in the context corresponding to ctxStr.
